document_data.name: Roving Dragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Roving Dragon''' was an inn and restaurant in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]] and owned by [[Caladarea Ithbeck]].
document_data.Geography: The inn was located on the promenade above [[Braundlae's Best]], a tavern run by [[Braundlae]].

Structure.Interior: The sunny chamber at the eastern end of the Dragon was called the ''Snout Room'', and afforded a good view of the [[Royal Gardens]] past the court buildings.

document_data.Food and drink: The restaurant served [[cider]], meat [[tart]]s, soursweet [[fish]] tarts, and [[soup]]s.
